about.personalProject: This page is a personal project that I use as part of my studies to explore and learn both backend and frontend technologies. Initially, the project was built using plain HTML, CSS, and JavaScript, but I am now transitioning it into a full-stack application to meet the requirements of my studies.

about.forAuth: for secure user authentication. Moving forward, I will be enhancing the backend further with features like
about.backendConclusion: , optimizing for scalability and performance. On the frontend, I am using
about.frontendConclusion: to create a dynamic, component-based user interface.
about.siteEvolution: This site will continue to evolve as I develop my skills and add new features to meet the objectives of both the frontend and backend modules. Feel free to explore the features and technologies I've implemented.
about.contactIntro: If you have any questions or just want to say hello, feel free to
about.thankYou: Thank you for visiting and showing interest in my learning project!

contact.questionMessage: Have a question or just want to say hello? Feel free to get in touch with me!
contact.reachMessage: You can reach me via email or on Github.

usernameError.minLength: Username must be at least 3 characters

passwordError.minLength: Password must be at least 8 characters long
passwordError.case: Password must include both upper and lower case letters
passwordError.number: Password must include at least one number
passwordError.symbol: Password must include at least one special symbol

registrationGuidelines.title: Registration Guidelines
usernameRequirements: Must be unique and not already in use
passwordRequirements: Include a mix of upper and lower case letters
{'Include at least one number and one special symbol (e.g., !, @, #)}'
Avoid using easily guessable information like your name or birthday
